summary: An examination of the life of acclaimed 'horse whisperer' Buck Brannaman, who recovered from years of child abuse to become a well-known expert in the interactions between horses and people.
cast: Buck Brannaman|Gary Myers|Bibb Frazier|Betty Staley|Gwynn Turnbull Weaver|Shayne Jackson|Annette Venteicher|Robert Redford|Reata Brannaman|Nevada Watt|Mary Brannaman|Johnny France|Betsy Shirley|Paige Morris|Bill Seaton|Ray Hunt|Tina Cornish|Britt Long|Dan Gunter|Julie Hueftle|Patti Hall|Scarlett Johansson|Sam Neill
keywords: horse assisted therapy|horse movie|horse jockey|horse stable|horse rider
